Description:
Castle Waste Services Limited t/a Castle Environme - 21/9/21 - 1 IN Health & Safety at Work etc. Act 1974, Section 2(1)
The Control of Substances Hazardous to Health Regulations 2002, Regulations 9(1) and 9(2)

LPJ/CWS/21092021/01 - 311895262

You have failed to arrange for a through examination and test of your portable LEV system to ensure that it is maintained in an efficient state, in efficient working order, in good repair and in a clean condition to prevent exposure to welding fume amongst your employees.
